alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cameron; Coastal Willacy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued January 15 at 10:45AM CST until January 17 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 33. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 possible. * WHERE...Coastal Willacy and Coastal Cameron Counties. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
